title: "This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus..."

This Week In React #115: Astro, Radix, Remix, Next.js, MDX, Storybook, Expo 46, Skia, TanStack, TC39, Docusaurus...

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->
Hi everyone!
Following the successful launch of Docusaurus 2.0, I didn't have time to send out the newsletter scheduled for earlier this week ğŸ˜…

segments.source_content: This is another special edition, on a Friday night, covering almost 3 weeks of news, and a lot has happened!

translations.fr: Voici une autre Ã©dition spÃ©ciale, un vendredi soir, couvrant prÃ¨s de 3 semaines d'actualitÃ©s, et il s'est passÃ© beaucoup de choses !

segments.source_content: Impossible to read everything or comment ğŸ˜¬. I made the choice to be exhaustive and include all the links that seemed interesting to me, without necessarily commenting on them. I would already have to read them myself before ğŸ˜… a bit overwhelmed now.

segments.source_content: During this month of August, I will focus on my Revue migration to ConvertKit. The next edition will be around August 20th, but it's also possible I skip it and won't send anything until early September.

translations.fr: Pendant ce mois d'aoÃ»t, je vais me concentrer sur ma migration de Revue vers ConvertKit. La prochaine Ã©dition sera vers le 20 aoÃ»t, mais il est aussi possible que je la saute et que je n'envoie rien jusqu'Ã  dÃ©but septembre.
translations.en: Durant ce mois d'aoÃ»t, je vais me concentrer sur ma migration de Revue vers ConvertKit. La prochaine Ã©dition sera vers le 20 aoÃ»t, mais il est aussi possible que je la saute et que je n'envoie rien avant dÃ©but septembre.

segments.source_content: Anyway, since we won't see each other for a while, at least you'll have something to read this summer ğŸ¤£

translations.fr: En tout cas, comme on ne se reverra pas avant un moment, vous aurez au moins de quoi lire cet Ã©tÃ© ğŸ¤£

## React
[**Announcing Docusaurus 2.0**](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)

Docusaurus is the React framework I'm working on with Meta. We just released v2.0. Very happy with this release which has been relayed all over! ğŸ’ Thanks so much for participating and contributing to the success! ğŸ™ Useful links:

segments.source_content: Gabe Greenberg, founder of G2i, has launched a fund onÂ [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)Â to provide financial assistance for the dev community. Developer are welcome to apply and use the fund for counseling/therapy, paid time between freelance projects, loan assistance, child care services, medical visits and expenses, etc.

translations.fr: Gabe Greenberg, fondateur de G2i, a lancÃ© un fonds surÂ [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter)Â pour fournir une assistance financiÃ¨re Ã  la communautÃ© des dÃ©veloppeurs. Les dÃ©veloppeurs peuvent postuler et utiliser le fonds pour des services de conseil/thÃ©rapie, du temps rÃ©munÃ©rÃ© entre projets freelance, une aide aux prÃªts, des services de garde d'enfants, des visites mÃ©dicales et dÃ©penses associÃ©es, etc.
translations.en: Gabe Greenberg, fondateur de G2i, a lancÃ© un fonds sur [**developerhealth.org**](https://developerhealth.org/?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter) pour fournir une assistance financiÃ¨re Ã  la communautÃ© des dÃ©veloppeurs. Les dÃ©veloppeurs peuvent postuler pour utiliser le fonds pour conseil/thÃ©rapie, temps payÃ© entre projets freelance, aide aux prÃªts, services de garde d'enfants, visites mÃ©dicales et dÃ©penses associÃ©es, etc.

segments.source_content: ## React-Native
[**Pedal to the Metal**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?utm_campaign=This%20Week%20In%20React&utm_medium=email&utm_source=Revue%20newsletter&v=uvLQ5f3KDXk)

ğŸ¤¯ This video by William Candillon is my favorite! You must watch it even if it's just for the intro, and the quality of the productionğŸ‘Œ It includes the latest news of React-Native-Skia which goes into alpha, is included in Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supports Snack, supports the web (with a Remotion starter), not to mention the perf improvements on the reconciler... In short, it moves fast and this is very exciting! It's also a nice collaboration with Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...

translations.fr: ğŸ¤¯ Cette vidÃ©o de William Candillon est ma prÃ©fÃ©rÃ©e ! Vous devez absolument la regarder ne serait-ce que pour l'intro et la qualitÃ© de production ğŸ‘Œ Elle inclut les derniÃ¨res actualitÃ©s de React-Native-Skia qui passe en alpha, est intÃ©grÃ© dans Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, supporte Snack et le web (avec un starter Remotion), sans oublier les amÃ©liorations de performances sur le rÃ©conciliateur... Bref, Ã§a avance vite et c'est trÃ¨s excitant ! Une belle collaboration entre Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...
translations.en: ğŸ¤¯ Cette vidÃ©o de William Candillon est ma prÃ©fÃ©rÃ©e ! Vous devez la regarder ne serait-ce que pour l'intro, et la qualitÃ© de production ğŸ‘Œ Elle inclut les derniÃ¨res nouvelles de React-Native-Skia qui passe en alpha, est inclus dans Expo Go via Expo SDK 46, prend en charge Snack, supporte le web (avec un starter Remotion), sans parler des amÃ©liorations de performance sur le rÃ©conciliateur... Bref, Ã§a bouge vite et c'est trÃ¨s excitant ! C'est aussi une belle collaboration avec Shopify, Expo, Google, Remotion...
